featured.title: The Rob Show #42 - Michelle Caserta
featured.content: Michelle Caserta, Rob's former teacher and mentor, joins the show to discuss her career and life.

featured.title: Jake Custer - New Music Added
featured.content: Added 5 new songs by Jake Custer to the media mix

featured.title: 'Alive on Central' Episodes 2-5 Now Streaming
featured.content: Added 4 episodes of Alive on Central to the media mix. Shoutout to Jack Galvin out in Newport. He's organizing another film festival this September 9 Central Film Festival If you're in the area, check it out!

featured.title: Emerging from Construction: Exciting Updates Ahead
featured.content: Not sure if you noticed but we've been adding new features to the app left and right - spent the summer in construction mode - but we're almost out - and we're excited to share some new features with you soon - poke around - and enjoy.

featured.title: The Rob Show Returns: New Episodes Every Thursday at 4pm!
featured.content: Ahoy, listeners! The Rob Show is back with a bang for a new season! We're happy to announce our commitment to bringing you fresh episodes every Thursday at 4pm, in time to energize that final stretch of the workweek. So gather 'round the water cooler, buckle up with a beevy, and join us every week weekly dose of inspiration and insight from the one and only Rob. The Rob Show is here to make your Thursdays the highlight of your work week!
